text: Digne-les-Bains is a commune in the Alpes-de-Haute-Provence department in the south-east of France. It is also the capital of the department. ==Twin towns== Digne is twinned with: * Bad Mergentheim, Germany * Borgomanero, Italy ==Other websites== Category:Communes in Alpes-de-Haute-Provence Category:Departmental capitals in France
title: Digne-les-Bains
